name: Ocolast: Origens de Paulo Guina
storyline:
You are Jailson Mendes, a reporter who prefers to risk his own life for the truth.

You have been sent to a prison to investigate Paulo Guina, an inmate suspected of leaving the OCO on several victims.

During your stay, Paulo Guina escapes from his cell and spreads the Delicia on everyone, leaving you alone with him.

Use your camera to see in the dark and record everything.

Use the prison cells to hide from Guina and find a way out of there.
summary: Ocolast - Origens de Paulo Guina is a fan-made prequel to the parody horror game, Ocolast. as you control Jailson Mendes, a reporter trapped in a prison with a deranged inmate called Paulo Guina.
